name: recall
oneLiner: Save what catches your eye, recall it anytime
description:
- **Motivation** - Wanted a tool that could save resources on the internet that I find interesting, and search or query it anytime
- Implemented **RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)** from scratch
- Users can add Blogs, and Notes
- All Iterations:
	- [Latest](https://youtu.be/aJ1d9uX3g_Y) - Separate page for adding content with Markdown Support, and Better UI
	- [First](https://youtu.be/IM7XrKOlbWQ)

name: helm
description:
- **Motivation** - I realized I kept running into the same problems with money management apps:
	1. Recording expenses feels like a chore
	2. The apps rarely gave me meaningful or actionable insights
	3. Bill splitting is a real pain
- This app aims to solves the above 'real' issues
- Curious about the thought process? Read more [here](/blog/reimagining-a-money-management-app)
